descriptionHtml:
In this save you take on the role of Ragnar Lothbrok, hero of Norse legend.
<br /><br /><br />This is of course based on the Ragnar from the show and not the Sagas.
<br /><br /><br />I spent hours on making him look as much as him as i possibly could.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Required mod: for the hair and tattoo
<br /><br /><br />                      https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=270443778
author: SKYMORDOR
